about_the_game:
Get ready for a world filled with determination, skill, and strategy! Battle Wave calls upon you to survive against waves of incoming enemies and enhance your character.

Choose between two different warriors and embark on your journey.
Handle the relentless waves of enemies. Each level includes more challenging enemy waves. Use the gold you earn from defeating enemies to upgrade your character. After each enemy wave, you have a 30-second preparation period. By using this time wisely, you can further strengthen your character and be prepared for the next wave. Conquer the enemy waves to complete the level and earn the right to progress to even more challenging levels. Maximize your skills and relish the taste of victory.
